verses.verse: Then spoke<WH1696> Elisha<WH477> to the woman,<WH802> whose<WH834> son<WH1121> he had restored<WH2421> to life,<WH2421> saying,<WH559> Arise,<WH6965> and go<WH3212> you and your household,<WH1004> and sojourn<WH1481> wherever<WH834> you can sojourn:<WH1481> for the LORD<WH3068> has called<WH7121> for a famine;<WH7458> and it shall also<WH1571> come<WH935> on the land<WH776> seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>
